nodes.text: The Haunted Village is a Star Wars Legends picture book that adapts the Ewoks episode of the same name. It is the first installment of a series based on the television series, and it was followed by To Save Deej. It was published by Dragon Picture Books on September 24, 1987.
The Ewoks are back in their own cartoon series.
Follow the adventures of these lovable creatures from 'Return of the Jedi' in these new picture books based on the TV series.
Wicket stops the hated Duloks from destroying the sacred sunberry trees and in the process proves that taking something that doesn't belong to you always ends in trouble.
